name: Honey Mustard Chicken
keywords: Honey Mustard Chicken, quick chicken recipe, easy weeknight dinner, Mediterranean cuisine, pan-fried chicken, healthy main course, spicy chicken, garlic chicken, chicken breast recipe, 15-minute meal, Honey, Dijon Mustard, Mustard, Oregano, Chicken Stock, Smoked Paprika, Paprika, Red Wine Vinegar, Olive Oil, Birdseye Chili, Garlic, Chicken, Chicken Breast
description: A quick and flavorful Honey Mustard Chicken featuring tender chicken breast in a tangy and sweet sauce with a spicy kick. Combining honey, Dijon mustard, garlic, and birdseye chili, this simple dish is pan-fried to perfection and ready in just 15 minutes, making it an ideal main course for a busy weeknight.

recipeInstructions.text: Mince garlic, chili and mix everything together in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper aggressively.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Fry chicken mix over a high heat until cooked through. Serve!
recipeInstructions.name: Fry chicken

notes: The measurements are... loose. When I make it I probably make it with a heaped teaspoon of mustard and vinegar.
I love to serve this with a greek salad or with rice. It also really works well with grilled chicken thighs on a sandwich.
